modName: Official Cops Skyrim Officer Jenkins Follower
summary: "Finally, Officer Jenkins of COPS: Skyrim can join you on your quest. This is the OFFICIAL follower mod featuring all new dialogue from Jenkins himself. " - AdjecentGAMES
descriptionHtml:
"Finally, Officer Jenkins of COPS: Skyrim can join you on your quest. This is the OFFICIAL follower mod featuring all new dialogue from Jenkins himself. " - AdjacentGAMES

Hello Fellow Mod lovers! I'm back with a special follower mod that I'm excited to bring you. AdjecentGAMES and I have teamed up to bring you Cops: Skyrim's OFFICIAL Officer Jenkins follower mod! Pretty awesome right? Of course is it. If you don't think this rocks then I pray Jenkins finds you in the night and brings the justice to your nether parts. Officer Jenkins will follow you around Skyrim bringing justice to the masses. It's like Judge Dredd but with a Dragonborn instead of an annoying Rob Schneider.

[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/800x600q90/607/9f01.png[/img]

Location:

Officer Jenkins is on duty in Mistveil Keep (Riften Castle) near the Jarl or walking around.

[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/800x600q90/607/9f01.png[/img]

Bugs:

PLEASE LEAVE COMMENTS REGARDING BUGS. This is my first follower mod and soon I will have more. It's always good to know issues so I can correct them for you.

Jenkin's Helmet bug: First, it's not a bug. His helmet should always stay where it is regardless of you giving him new armor. His helmet is the best so enjoy it.

[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/800x600q90/607/9f01.png[/img]

As always, leave comments and suggestions below. I'll answer them when I can although work has me busy these days.

RATE UP! IF NOT FOR ME THEN FOR JENKINS! (He'll beat me if you don't rate up)
author: Owlburgers
